main.net.atos.uk.TravelDashboard.Login

Class SignupAuthorization

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.net.atos.uk.TravelDashboard.Login.SignupAuthorization

  • public class SignupAuthorization
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the authorization class of sign up process. All of the rules are in 'userInputVaild' method, and new rule can be easily added. The password uses SHA-256 to encode, therefore the input password is translated first.
    Since:
    2017-04-08
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Zequn Yu

      Authorization userInputValid(java.lang.String inputUsername, java.lang.String inputPassword, java.lang.String inputPasswordAgain, java.lang.String emailAddress, java.lang.String registerCode)
      To check if input is valid for sign up a new account.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SignupAuthorization

        public SignupAuthorization()

    • Method Detail

      • userInputValid

        public Authorization userInputValid(java.lang.String inputUsername,
                                    java.lang.String inputPassword,
                                    java.lang.String inputPasswordAgain,
                                    java.lang.String emailAddress,
                                    java.lang.String registerCode)
        To check if input is valid for sign up a new account. The rules are: default register code is "Atos17", username is available, that is not found in the database, username only contains A-Z, a-z, 0-9, two times input password matched, password must be longer than 6, password only contains A-Z, a-z, 0-9, email address contains an '@'.
        Parameters:
        inputUsername - The user input username
        inputPassword - The user's first input password
        inputPasswordAgain - The user's second input password
        emailAddress - The user input email address
        registerCode - The user input register code
        Returns:
        Authorization class that contains a boolean value and the information in details
